articles.title: Why do COVID-19 symptoms last so long? New study aims to find out - Deseret News
articles.description: A new study by the National Institutes of Health looks at why coronavirus symptoms last so long for ‘long-haulers.’
articles.content:
The National Institutes of Health will be conducting a new study to determine why people have COVID-19 symptoms for such a long time, according to NBC News.
Whats going on?
